co.cask.coopr.store.credential
Interface CredentialStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
InProcessCredentialStore, MemcachedCredentialStore
public interface CredentialStore

Credential store for getting, setting, and wiping sensitive information such as user credentials. Implementations should not persist any data to disk. All fields are stored as a single entity for a cluster in a tenant.

Method Summary
 Map<String,String> get(String tenantId, String clusterId)
          Get the fields for the given tenant and cluster.
 void set(String tenantId, String clusterId, Map<String,String> fields)
          Set fields for the given tenant and cluster.
 void wipe()
          Wipe out all fields for all tenants and all clusters.
 void wipe(String tenantId, String clusterId)
          Wipe out the fields for the tenant and cluster.

Throws:

          throws IOException
Wipe out all fields for all tenants and all clusters.
